Name: Blacklight
About the game: Fly, Run, Solidify and Break! Light-paced 2D fighting game! A simple fighting game with a dash that can stop immediately, a two-step jump, a dash in the air, and a variety of other moves that are easy to control. A simple fighting game with a variety of moves and easy controls. There is a risk of grinding and guard crashes when guarding, and the damage of techniques is large, so the tempo of each match is fast. Easy to understand and quick to learn, you're ready to fight! Great training mode and networking features! Hitbox, frame data, and recording/playback functions allow you to check the situation in detail. Lobby function and rollback are available for online matches. You can comfortably play against players from far away! Features Six unique characters. Lobby function and rollback for online matches. Practice mode with hitboxes and frame data. Replay function.
